title: Renew a Professional License
description: An engineer needs to renew their state professional engineering license.

tasks.description: Identify the engineer by their license number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the engineer's license record.

tasks.description: Verify that the engineer has completed the required number of continuing education credits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the continuing education requirements have been met.

tasks.description: Process the renewal fee and update the license expiration date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes payment and successfully renews the license.
